mapper.select: select count(1) from coupon c INNER JOIN user u on c.couponId = u.youhuiId INNER JOIN couponimg ci on c.imgId = ci.imgId where u.userId=${userId}

select u.shiyongyouhuiquan,u.userId, u.userAccount,c.couponType,c.couponStarttime,c.couponEndtime,c.imgId,ci.imgUrl from coupon c INNER JOIN user u on c.couponId = u.youhuiId INNER JOIN couponimg ci on c.imgId = ci.imgId where u.userId=${userId} LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
